A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I wanted to write a review here as I am sick of reading so-called critic reviews that are unconditionally praising this bloated mess of a movie.  The studio's allied sites appear to be posting propaganda stating that anyone criticizing this movie is just a whiny fanboy trying to cling on to their childhood.  No\, that's not it.  I am just amazed that serious journalists have abandoned their critical faculties in praise of this dumb movie.

Luke Skywalker bears no relation whatsoever to the character I know.  He's now a bitter\, defeated old man who milks space cows?  Give me a break.  Not credible.  

Rian Johnson clearly wanted to flip the bird at Star Wars fans\, and did just that.

Not to mention Leia Poppins and a casino planet yawnfest which slowed the pacing of the film completely.  

Abrams has absolutely nothing to work with for Episode IX.  Good luck with that\, JJ. Crap movie.
